name: Cat vs Anime
description:
by Andrew Gwinner (@gingeritus)

How To Play

  • Your cat wants to knead on its favorite pillow but also get petted by you.
  • Your anime wants you to watch it.
  • You? You're just chilling.
  • You can tap/click on the cat to pet it
